title: Spiritual and Martial Conqueror - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
tags: Beast Companions   Bloodlines   Enemies Become Allies   Enemies Become Lovers   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Leadership   Martial Spirits   Outer Space   Polygamy   Romantic Subplot   Sect Development   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: Yu Feng   禹枫
description: After he transmigrated, he became the good-for-nothing young master and met the mysterious old man, Uncle Nan. To protect his family and his beauties, Lu Shaowu stepped onto the path of the strong. The path of the strong was filled with thorns, but it was unable to obstruct the heart of a strong practitioner. It was said that at the peak of Martial Dao and at the peak of the Spiritual Dao, one would be able to shatter the void. He cultivated both spiritual art and martial art and became unparalleled in the world.>
